We are ever ready to work.We always ready to work.

skills.title: Graphic Designing

skills.title: Networking
skills.description: We have experienced Network Engineers who are have extraordinary skills in PAN(Personal Area Network), LAN(Local Area Network), MAN(Metropolitan Area Network), WAN(Wide Area Network). We help in the transport anad exchange of data between nodes over a shared medium. We are ready to work remotely and in office.

portfolio.title: TERMINAL REPORT CARDS FOR SERWAA NYARKO GIRLS' SHS
portfolio.description: We designed report cards for Serwaa Nyarko Girls' Senior High Schols.We got a project as Cyber-Dev Kings was to design and generate terminal report cards for Serwaa Nyarko Girls' Senior High School in Kumasi. We utilized Microsoft Office Word, Excel and mailing to create personalized report cards for the students.

portfolio.title: TECH-TALK AT SERWAA NYARKO SHS
portfolio.description: Service Highlight: Inspiring Future Tech Leaders at Serwaa Nyarko Girls' SHS.Our team recently had the privilege of visiting Serwaa Nyarko Girls' Senior High School in Kumasi, Ghana, where we engaged with the vibrant I.T Club during a stimulating Tech Talk session. Our goal was to inspire and empower these young minds with insights into the latest technological trends and innovations

portfolio.title: DATABASE FOR THE CATHOLIC YOUTH ORGANIZATION
portfolio.description: Database Management System (DBMS) for Catholic Youth Organisation (CYO) of Suame Deanery Project Overview. Cyber-Dev Kings  designed and developed a comprehensive Database Management System (DBMS) for the Catholic Youth Organisation (CYO) of Suame Deanery in Kumasi. The project is divided into two phases, and we have successfully completed Phase One.
